Description:
Just what the family ordered!
Settled into a court, this youthful yet fully-established family home has all you need. Surprisingly under 4 kilometres from the city centre, it's also perfectly positioned to please busy mums and dads, tripping about between the plethora of priorities that come with parental bedlam!
Primary school is an 8 minute bike ride away, secondary just 13. Lake Weeroona a 30 minute wander and even puppy school is a few doors up the street! Bendigo Hospital is less than 3 kilometres for work or those inevitable expeditions to ER too!
Monochrome, minimalist styling allows whatever you wish to make your own dream decor come true here. Sleek sun-shades and blinds bring bright natural light indoors or shelter from summer's swelter, an efficient way to save energy!
Opposite master bedroom, the study would make an excellent temporary nursery using a screen. Appointed with good-sized walk-in robe, the main bedroom also has an unusual ensuite lay-out permitting a larger shower. Near the big family bathroom, 2 children's bedrooms have built-in robes.
Visually encompassing the hallway greatly expands lounge dimensions, leading through to open family zone. Lack of passageways reduces cost of running ducted heating and cooling. In a well-designed kitchen with dishwasher, gas cooktop and electric oven, an island breakfast bar is dedicated to casual meals and preparation rather than show-casing the sink.
Supplying ample space to play and entertain undercover of a generous alfresco area within a compact fenced yard, double garage, landscaping and more will no doubt add to having this home sold very soon!
Insights: 6 Arbor Place, White Hills VIC 3550 was last sold in 2018 and 40 other 3 bedroom house in White Hills have recently been sold.

Description:
Botanica Green - perfectly positioned for families
*Botanica Green is a new boutique residential estate
*Offering an impressive list of lifestyle rich features
*Set opposite the beautiful Botanical Gardens
*Only 3.6 km from the Bendigo CBD
*Positioned in one of Bendigo's most highly regarded locations
*Close to schools, shops, health & sporting facilities
*Walking and cycling trails nearby
*Regional Park & Lake Weeroona at your doorstep
This block of land represents a fabulous opportunity for first home buyers to secure a great block of land and to take advantage of the first home owner grants of $20,000 on new homes and the savings on stamp duty where contracts are signed after 1st July, 2017. Why not give us a call to ascertain how you could secure the block today and still receive the grants.
*Lot sizes from 525m2 to 795m2

Description:
Reach for the affordable dream.
First home buyers, this could be the one – and the beginning of a beautiful partnership!
It's perfectly comfortable as it is, but offers great potential for future improvement and/or extension as your family (and budget) grows.
Alternatively, investors will appreciate it is lease-ready with nothing to spend.
The weatherboard home features the classic 1950's facade of front porch with wrought iron balustrading and easy-care gardens.
Inside, there are three bedrooms, two with robes, large, separate lounge with tapestry brick fireplace, gas heating, and split system air con., original kitchen with stainless steel gas stove and meals area, updated three-piece bathroom and ceiling fans throughout.
Set on approx. 423 square metre allotment with a big, secure backyard, single carport and 3.7m x 7m garage/workshop with concrete floor and power.
Ideally positioned in a quiet court within walking distance to the Bendigo Botanical Gardens, schools, shops, public transport and handy to the CBD.
It's the ideal place to start your home ownership journey.

Address: 148 - 150 St Killian Street White Hills VIC 3550
Description:
Endless Opportunities
Situated on a just under an acre of residentially zoned land, this fantastic property provides scope for further development (STCA) or just enjoy it as is!
Inside features:
-Fully renovated throughout
-Main bedroom with WIR and ensuite
-Huge 4th bedroom/3rd living space
-Large family/rumpus room
-Open plan kitchen/living/meals area
-S/S appliances in kitchen and huge fridge space
-Granite overlay in kitchen and bathrooms
-Loads of storage throughout the home
-Tiles and vinyl planks throughout
-Ducted reverse cycle heating and cooling
-Gas log fire in the lounge room
-Crimsafe wires on all external windows and doors
-24 solar panels and 24 battery storage system
-Tinted windows to block out summer sun
-6 undercover car spaces
Outside features:
-Huge Spanline outdoor area with sun blinds
-Garage and tool shed
-Chicken pen with a run
-Carport for motorhome or caravan
-Huge side access to the rear
-Roof refinished and fitted with Gutter Guard
-Beautiful Native garden with drive-through driveway
-Many fruit trees and veggie gardens
-9x water tanks and 4x pressure pumps
-Extensive watering systems
-Bird lovers paradise with nesting boxes
-Development potential (STCA)
Contact Andrew on 0419544251 for further details and to register for a private viewing. All enquirers must include a mobile number.

Description:
Nothing left to do
Situated in a new development in White Hills only 10 minutes from the Bendigo city centre and close to all public transport and amenities in White Hills. This particular, already built House and Land package is turn key, move in with nothing else to do. Everything is supplied even the number for your letterbox! The plan features 4 spacious bedrooms, open plan living, separate lounge room, dining opening onto the alfresco area creating seamless inside outside living. The main bedroom has a WIR and ensuite, whilst the other 2 bedrooms feature BIRs. Ducted gas heating and evaporative cooling ensure climate control year round. Stainless steel appliances and a walk in pantry complete your dream kitchen. This property comes fully fenced and landscaped with a small low maintenance garden. It is perfect for downsizers, first home buyers and investors alike.

Neat Home With The Space You Need
Looking for a neat home that has a large allotment PLUS a large shed? This just listed property could be the one you have been looking for and is well worth an inspection. With 3 bedrooms, a kitchen with gas cooking, lounge with gas heating, ducted cooling and a bathroom with SOB, it is a comfortable home with the added bonus of a one bedroom bungalow out the back. This property is ideal for the young tradesman, having a massive shed (with concrete and the option of 3 phase power), with the block size of approx. 1/4 acre. Located in popular White Hills, close to schools, shops and local amenities.

Description:
Great Value Home - Excellent First Home
Whether you're searching for your 1st or 10th home the secret is to buy the best value home in the best area your budget can find. Well, in my opinion this home ticks all the right boxes for anyone with a budget around $300,000.
*Neat and tidy weatherboard home
*Quiet no through street location
*516sqm allotment with two street access
*Currently rented for $280per week.
*Outdoor covered entertainment area
*Lockup garage and single carport
*100m walk to Bus Stop
*1.7km walk or drive to Lake Weerona
*2.0km walk or drive to Bendigo Hospital
*3.3km drive to Alexandra Fountain
This home is a great first home or investment property, call Mark O'Shea on 0437745726 for full details.

Description:
Californian Charmer – A Real Gem!
Calling all first home buyers or investors. This classic Californian Bungalow oozes the charm of the period and is nestled in a well maintained traditional street with in walking distance to the magnificent Botanical Gardens, schools, shopping & transport. The home Includes an updated kitchen with gas cooking and scullery, large formal lounge with gas heating and reverse cycle split air-conditioner, formal dining off the kitchen, rear family/sun-room and 3 good size bedrooms. From inside to out the property includes a garage with extra length and private rear yard. This charming period home is neat and retains many of its original features and would make an excellent home for the first home buyer or investor alike. Expected rental $290.00pw. A fantastic opportunity in one of Bendigo's traditional streets.

Description:
Mid-century Marvel with Supberb Shedding
In a quiet street only minutes away from Lake Weeroona sits this charming cream brick veneer home with a red tiled roof, which is ready to be lived in, or renovated. The house comprises three generously-proportioned bedrooms with polished floorboards and ceiling fans, kitchen with ample bench and storage space, a three piece bathroom, and a second toilet located at the rear of the property. Keep cool in Summer and warm in Winter with ducted heating and cooling. Although the property is move-in ready, keen renovators will enjoy adding a modern twist internally while preserving the character-giving features of the property, including the original decorative cornices.
Externally, a double gate provides access to the fully-enclosed backyard where you will find a large pergola-protected entertaining area, along with a single-car carport, a garage with power connected, and a significant amount of open shedding. Alongside this is a well-maintained garden with established and thriving plants. This private yard provides the perfect space for you to entertain guests or simply enjoy the peaceful neighbourhood.
Take advantage of the close proximity of this home to schools and shops and its short distance from the CBD. At present, the property is leased to excellent tenants for $270 per week, but has the option for vacant possession if preferred.
Why wait? 11 Grace Street can be the next valuable addition to your investment portfolio or an ideal way for a first home buyer to enter the property market in a sought after suburb.

Description:
LARGE CORNER ALLOTMENT WITH SUBDIVISION POTENTIAL (STCA)
This tidy low maintenance property is situated on a large corner allotment with sub division potential (STCA). Conveniently positioned in White Hills this property enjoys easy access to the city centre, public transport, schools and parks. The home features three comfortable bedrooms, open plan living meals and kitchen with gas wall heater and split systems, a family bathroom and large laundry. Outside features a single carport, large yard and garden shed. This home would ideally suit and investor, first home buyer or if your downsizing and want a comfortable low maintenance home.
Note: ALL ENQUIRIES MUST INCLUDE A PHONE NUMBER
PHOTO ID REQUIRED AT INSPECTIONS

Description:
Heaps Of Potential
Hidden away in a quiet pocket in White Hills is this well maintained, low maintenance home on a 2746m2 block. The home is neat and tidy with 3 good sized bedrooms, kitchen, meals and lounge with gas log fire. The established garden has a lovely variety of plants and there is a large carport and assorted shedding. Other facilities include rustic stables and 2 fully fenced paddocks for livestock with water supplied to each yard. The property has the potential to be subdivided STCA or could continue to be used as a hobby farm. Surrounded by crown land with railway reserve at the front, there is plenty of privacy. Just a short walk to public transport and schools, an astute buyer will have the benefit of a rural setting with the convenience of living close to all amenities. This property will not last long so be quick.
*2746m2 block
*3 bedroom home
*Family bathroom, ambulant shower
*Lounge with gas log fire
*Kitchen with gas cooking
*Meals area
*Shedding and Stables
*Subdivision potential STCA

Description:
Where Contemporary Blends with Rustic
This solar passive architecturally designed home is sure to impress! Situated on a quiet street in White Hills on just over 2,600 m2 of land, this fantastic property provides the perfect place for the family to enjoy.
The main features of this home are the stunning cathedral ceilings with natural coloured polished concrete floors and the designated outdoor entertainment spaces.
The house is set back from the road amongst the trees, creating a private and tranquil setting.
Inside features:
-Grand formal entrance
-Main bedroom with WIR and ensuite
-2 remaining bedrooms with BIR
-Open plan kitchen/living/meals area
-Stainless Steel appliances in kitchen
-Large family bathroom with separate toilet
-Plenty of storage throughout the home
-Slate tiles and polished concrete throughout living
-Reverse Cycle split system heating and cooling
-Open fireplace in the formal lounge room
-1.5 kW solar panel system
-Large office space with built-in desk and shelving
Outside features:
-Workshop with concrete and power
-Separate brick 2 car garage with auto door
-Rear undercover patio with a potbelly stove
-2nd entertainment space with wood fire
-Side access to the rear
-Raised veggie garden boxes
-Bird lovers paradise

Description:
NEAT, SWEET BEGINNERS TREAT
The 1960's gave us pocket transistor radios, psychedelic coloured mini skirts, bold furniture and semi-modern weatherboard homes. While all the other icons have disappeared, the houses have stood the test of time – and this one is a prime example.
Trim, taut and terrific, it has been well maintained, extended and updated over the years. It features three good-sized bedrooms, all with robes, modernised three-piece bathroom, gas-heated living room with polished timber floors adjoining tiled kitchen and dining area. U-shaped kitchen boasts gas cooker, dishwasher, good bench space and storage including appliance cupboard.
A rear extension incorporates a great family living room with cosy solid fuel heater opening to a covered outdoor living area.
Added features include wall-mounted air conditioner to the living room, ceiling fans, sliding door access to the front patio from the dining area, external awnings, double garage with concrete floor and power.
Set on a big block approx 1000m², it has a huge backyard with road at the rear lending itself to development STCA.
Well-located close to schools, Lake Weeroona and the CBD with bus past the door.
Already a proven rental performer currently let at $295p/w, it also has immediate appeal to investors. Likewise vacant possession available. Call for an inspection today.

Description:
HEART-WARMING CHARACTER – BOTANICAL GARDEN VIEW!
Offering an awesome position with a slice of heritage, tucked in a convenient central location. This is one for those looking to renovate & update cosmetically to place your own stamp on a classic Victorian. Situated on a substantial allotment over 700 sq.m, complete with side access to the bloke’s shed with concrete & power (30ft X 20ft).
· Offering three large bedrooms, central bathroom, huge high ceilings and a lovely cottage vibe.
· Central original kitchen featuring all modern conveniences including island bench, plenty of storage, pantry & open plan meals area.
· Year-round comfort is assured with evaporation cooling & gas heating.
· The rear alfresco veranda is the perfect space for entertaining.
· There's no shortage of opportunity here.
· Blokes shed at the rear, concrete & power (30ft X 20ft).
Nestled in one of the friendliest White Hills Streets with garden views, proximity to local schools, childcare, kindergarten, shops, picturesque walking tracks all on your doorstep. Here is a beautiful opportunity to get into the market & add value to the home, where your investment will appreciate for many years to come.
Insights: 78 Napoleon Crescent, White Hills VIC 3550 was last sold in 2018 and 40 other 3 bedroom house in White Hills have recently been sold.

Description:
Live or lease beside the lake.
Well-maintained brick veneer townhouse is the pick of two on the block. Set at the back of the block it includes a spacious enclosed backyard with the treed Bendigo Creek reserve for a backdrop.
It features a good-sized lounge with split system heating/cooling, u-shaped kitchen with gas cooktop and electric oven, built-in robes to both bedrooms, separate bath and shower and walk-through laundry with a wall of storage cupboards.
The single garage has a remote door and personal access to the residence and the backyard while the complex includes some off-street visitor parking.
Great position, walking distance to Lake Weeroona, public transport and close to the centre of town.
Excellent property for investors or owner occupiers, it has already has a good rental history.
Insights: 2/57 Weeroona Avenue, White Hills VIC 3550 was last sold in 2018 and 2 other 2 bedroom unit in White Hills have recently been sold.
